title: MSBuild.exe /? still shows /debug option
body: We removed support for `/debug` in #163, but we didn't remove the help text that mentions it. We shouldn't tease people with a cut feature.

nodes.body: @rainersigwald, is it reasonable to remove `enum` value `ParameterlessSwitch.Debugger` from the set?
@nikson My first inclination is to leave the enum value (and the string resource) while we have the code `#if`ed out. When we commit to removal we can clean it all up together.
